Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
libido \li*bi"do\ (l[i^]*b[=e]"d[-o]), n. 1. Sexual desire; the sexual instinct; the sex drive. [PJC]
2. (Psychoanalysis) Those desires and instinctual energies which are derived from the id. [PJC]
libido n : (psychoanalysis) a Freudian term for sexual urge or desire
